PieceManager Class Reference

The PieceManager class manages all the information concerning pieces and blocks for a BT client. More...

Detailed Description

The PieceManager class manages all the information concerning pieces and blocks for a BT client.

Date:
2009-03-06
Version:
1.2
Author:
Blekinge Institute of Technology TEK-ATS

) [private]

Implements the simple linear piece selection policy.

2007-10-23

unsigned char* PieceManager::myPieces [private]

Pointer to an array of bits representing the pieces that this client owns.

Every bit represents one piece.
